mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruits(company_name, department_id, position_id, company_add) VALUES (#{companyName}, #{department.departmentId}, #{position.positionId}, #{companyAdd})
mapper.update: UPDATE recruits SET company_name=#{companyName}, department_id=#{department.departmentId}, position_id=#{position.positionId}, company_add=#{companyAdd} WHERE recruit_id=#{recruitId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recruits r, departments d, positions p WHERE r.department_id=d.department_id AND r.position_id=p.position_id
